Name: Appeal to the Stars op. 28
Notes: A prayer to the gods of night in the very earliest of Semitic languages - Akkadian accompanied by exotic instruments. The work combines singing, playing instruments and ritualic movements. The vocalists, dressed in white, play recorders and beat with iron bars and with palm tree branches picked in the Jordan Valley.
